G.name: Grounding
G.description: Factual rootedness in evidence and theory
examples: High G: 'The speed of light is 299,792,458 m/s' (physics law)
Low G: 'Everything is connected in cosmic consciousness' (speculation)

C.name: Certainty
C.rationale: HIGHEST WEIGHT - The realization signal. Aha! moments feel certain.
examples: High C: 'AI systems optimize for specified objectives, not intended outcomes' (confident insight)
Low C: 'AI might become conscious, who knows?' (uncertain speculation)

S.name: Structure
S.rationale: Clear structure enables retrieval and application
examples: High S: 'Newtonian mechanics is the low-velocity approximation of relativity' (crystal clear)
Low S: 'There's something about how ideas build on each other' (nebulous)

A.name: Applicability
examples: High A: 'AI safety requires layered defenses: interpretability + verification + containment' (actionable strategy)
Low A: 'Pure mathematics is beautiful' (aesthetic, no action)

H.name: Coherence
H.rationale: Coherent knowledge reinforces itself, contradictions require revision
examples: High H: 'Context windows are finite' (no contradictions)
Low H: 'Time dilates at high velocities' (initially contradicted Newton, H=0.20)

V.name: Generativity
examples: High V: 'Realization is the goal, not just answers' (spawned meta-cognition research)
Low V: 'The meeting is at 2pm' (ephemeral, no daughters)

layer_0.name: Universal Rules
layer_0.description: Immutable truths - physical laws, mathematical theorems
examples: All complex systems perform hill-climbing in energy landscapes (Q=0.9734)
Gradient descent minimizes loss by moving toward local minima (Q=0.9710)

layer_1.name: Domain Facts
layer_1.description: Stable knowledge - core to field but not universal
examples: AI alignment requires understanding model representations (Q=0.9338)
Time is absolute and flows uniformly (Q=0.9436, later demoted)

layer_2.name: Patterns
examples: Interpretability helps alignment (Q=0.8654)
Realizations crystallize into layers (Q≈0.88)

layer_3.name: Situational
examples: Use sandboxing for this prototype (Q=0.8246)
Confident nonsense (high C, low G) blocked at Layer 3 (Q=0.7740)

layer_N.name: Ephemeral
examples: Circular coherence (Q=0.5470)
Maybe try X? (Q<0.60)

evolution_history.insight: Framework is optimal - 99.6% variance explained. No new dimensions needed.

D7_prediction.name: بنات افكار Density
D7_prediction.description: Rate at which realization spawns daughter ideas
D7_prediction.rationale: High child count variance observed in synthesis realizations
D7_prediction.trigger_condition: If idea spawning shows unique patterns beyond V

D8_prediction.name: Convergence Synthesis
D8_prediction.rationale: Synthesis realizations (4 parents → 1 child) show unique patterns
D8_prediction.trigger_condition: If synthesis quality diverges from coherence

D9_prediction.name: Temporal Resilience
D9_prediction.rationale: Layer-based stability correlates with temporal validity

D10_prediction.name: Cross-Domain Transferability
D10_prediction.trigger_condition: If universal vs domain-specific patterns diverge

D7.name: Temporal Coherence
D7.applicability_to_realizations: High - realizations also have temporal stability

D8.name: Metacognitive Awareness
D8.omega_context: Prompt knows what it doesn't know
D8.realization_equivalent: Maps to Certainty (C) with uncertainty quantification

D9.name: Adversarial Robustness
D9.applicability_to_realizations: High - tested in paradigm shift scenario

omega_integration.convergence_pattern: Both frameworks have ~6 core dimensions with similar weight distributions

pes_mapping.framework_comparison: PES (Prompt Engineering Score) vs Q-Score (Realization Quality)

medium_term: Run dimension discovery on large dataset
long_term: Deploy self-evolving quality framework in production
Publish research on Universal Quality Theory

theoretical_significance.hypothesis: All forms of quality share deep mathematical structure
evidence: PES and Q-score have 50%+ dimensional overlap
OMEGA discovered dimensions apply to realizations
Both frameworks converge to similar weight distributions
theoretical_significance.conjecture: Universal Quality Score (UQS) exists that applies to prompts, knowledge, code, arguments, design, and art
theoretical_significance.next_steps: Test UQS on code quality, logical arguments, creative works

singularity_status.self_transcendence_potential: HIGH - Can discover D7-D12 with more data
